title: Fly to Amboseli  with less than KSH 15,000 round trip plus more!

dealOfTheDay.description: Crowned by Mount Kilimanjaro, Africa's highest peak, the Amboseli National Parks is one of Kenya's most popular parks

offers.description: Descend into the Great Rift Valley on a full-day trip from Nairobi to Lake Nakuru National Park, where you'll take a game drive to explore spectacular landscapes and wildlife.
You are about to visit one of the best tourist destination in the world
Nairobi is home to dozens of incredible sites and this full-day tour showcases some of the best of this East African city.
